Articles.Content: even if it means creating a new profile. I only had like 3 posts on my last one. Mainly did a bunch of lurking and spaceport downloading. I've learned a lot in the past few months, but I feel I've only yet scratched the surface of what this amazing game has to offer. This has got to be the most exciting and collaborative community I've ever been a part of, and I'm proud to be here. To the devs!

Welcome back fractl

Half of KSP is the great community that's built up around it so it's time to stop lurking and get posting

Have fun on the forums and fly safe in KSP!
